title: misc/cgo: TestSignalForwardingExternal flake
body:
TestSignalForwardingExternal was seen being flaky on trybots:

https://storage.googleapis.com/go-build-log/2edf97e5/linux-386_fc7f575b.log
```
##### misc/cgo/testcarchive
--- FAIL: TestSignalForwardingExternal (60.49s)
	carchive_test.go:340: test program succeeded unexpectedly
FAIL
2016/03/25 02:52:47 Failed: exit status 1
```

/cc @ianlancetaylor @jtsylve
